snippet: Ms. Adichie’s novel told the story of a young woman who moved from Nigeria to the United States to pursue an education.
abstract: Authors Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie and Sheri Fink are among winners of the National Book Critics Circle Awards for books Americanah and Five Days at Memorial: Life and Death in a Storm-Ravaged Hospital.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Adichie’s novel told the story of a young woman who moved from Nigeria to the United States to pursue an education.

headline.main: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie and Sheri Fink Win Book Awards
headline.print_headline: Adichie and Fink Win Book Awards
